name: RGB Knight
description:
The evil wizard has come to kidnap the princess! He cast a magic creating color copies of you! You have to fight and defeat your color copies to defeat the wizard and save the princess!

CONTROLS:

-A and D to move

-SPACE to jump

-W to dash attack

-R to restart boss

Supports Controller!

-D Pad or left joystick to move 

-Button south (X on PS4, B on switch, A on Xbox) to jump

-Button West (Square on PS4, Y on switch, X on Xbox) to restart boss

-Button East (Circle on PS4,  A on switch, B on Xbox ) to dash attack

Game made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 111. 

Theme: Colors

Limitation: You are your own enemy.

NOTE: I uploaded the .ZIP file now because when I submitted the project I uploaded only the executable and not the zip, but I didn't notice my mistake because it was 3 a.m. and I went to sleep.  Now that I noticed it I uploaded the right file.  Also it seems that the tilemap collision isn't working very well...
